author: Staff Reporter
text:
The District Election Officer and Collector V. Sampath has finalised the list of venues for conducting meetings by the political parties and for star campaigners in the constituencies in the district for the election.

Venues permitted in each constituency include, Gangavalli (SC) - seven venues, Attur – eight, Yercaud – 15, Omalur – seven, Mettur – five, Edappadi – 10, Sankari – five, Salem West – seven, Salem North – eight, Salem South – eight, and Veerapandi – nine.

Venues were also finalised for star campaigners in the district.
title: Venues finalised
